section.title: Artisan.Tools.Globalization.AgCountryCodes Class Reference

para.para: Static class which resolves country codes and country names.

listitem.para: Resolves the two digit country code into a country name.
Resolves the country name into a 2 digit code.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Static class which resolves country codes and country names.

string Artisan.Tools.Globalization.AgCountryCodes.CodeFromName (string countryName)
Resolves the country name into a 2 digit code.
Parameters
countryName
The long, case insensitive, version of the country, such as "UniTED statES"
Returns
Returns the two digit country code for the name

The string version for the country code, such as "United States". returns "" if not found
